title: Airlines Scratch More Flights as Omicron Variant Advances
sub_head: U.S. says it is working to ensure hospitals arenâ€™t overwhelmed by Covid-19 patients
body:
The fast-spreading Omicron variant took a toll on the Christmas holiday weekend, as airlines canceled hundreds of flights because of staffing shortages that are likely to ripple throughout the economy in the days ahead.
Evidence so far suggests the Omicron variant generally leads to less-severe disease than earlier strains of the virus. But the travel cancellations show how even a milder but rapidly spreading version of Covid-19 can disrupt the economy and everyday life.
